.. _apptainer_checkpoint_list:

apptainer checkpoint list
-------------------------

List local checkpoints (experimental)

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The checkpoint list command will list the checkpoints stored at $HOME/.apptainer/checkpoints
  for use with container instances.

::

  apptainer checkpoint list

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    To list checkpoints:
    $ apptainer checkpoint list

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for list

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer checkpoint <apptainer_checkpoint>` 	 - Manage container checkpoint state (experimental)

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 22-Mar-2023*
